channel.title: How to make your friends play with you?
channel.description:
Hello;P im newb.. How do i make my friends play with me on my server?
THNQ[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 11:18:44 AM[/size][hr]Bump... please help? ;D[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 12:48:24 PM[/size][hr]OMG NO replys!-.- cmon guys?

item.title: How to make your friends play with you?
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

Sorry, I thought you meant HybridScape. Yes they can. When they are on the MoparScape Log-In Screen all they need to do is change the IP to yours and they will play with you (On the Server :P)

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your friends play with you?
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

You don’t click “Start Server” just play it normally. Or, if you use Dodian Server Client www.dodian.com, there is usually 50+ Players on that or Project16 usually has a few.

Read full topic
